name: Underwater CATastrophe
description:
A game made for MashUp Game Jam 2022.

This cute cat is stuck in a sticky situation deep underwater! With its trusty wave gun, maneuver through waves of dangerous sea creatures!

Genre: Action
Theme: Gravity
Setting: Underwater
Item: Cat

Controls:

Move using WASD. Aim & Shoot using mouse.

Credits:

Kelli - Concept image
Daioner - 2D Art/Animations
ansimuz - Background image & fish sprites

I was unable to finish in time. It was a great learning experience nonetheless, considering this is my first game jam. Definitely will come back to this game after the jam is over.
